Exactly what I was looking for! The bar at the top of chrome looks really nice, as it is a dark coloration with white text, but you can still see the difference between the tabs. The largest complaint about this theme is that a large portion of the core isn't visible. However, Even this looks natural, as if it was designed to be that way. I rarely make reviews, but I had to this time. Even after over a year of use, this theme has yet to disappoint me!
